name: Numeric Code (currency)
xml:
<field
	type="text"
	name="numeric_code"
	label="Numeric Code"
	description="There is also a three-digit code number assigned to each currency, in the same manner as there is also a three-digit code number assigned to each country as part of ISO 3166. This numeric code is usually the same as the ISO 3166-1 numeric code. For example, USD (United States dollar) has code 840 which is also the numeric code for the US (United States)."
	class="text_area"
	filter="INT"
	message="Error! Please add numeric code here."
	hint="516"
/>
